As per the Finance Act, 2020 for the provision of TCS under section 206C(1G) of the Income tax Act, 1961 (the Act), Tax Collection at Source (TCS) at 5% will be applicable for this transaction, if the amount for remittance under the LRS scheme is in excess of INR 7 Lakh in aggregate, in a financial year. The tax will be collected over and above the amount of cumulative remittance of INR 7 lakh in a financial year, effective from Oct 01, 2020. Additionally, as per the new regulatory guidelines, the higher TCS rate (upto 10%) will be applicable if the Income Tax Return for the last 2 years has not been timely filed, with effect from Jul 01, 2021. I authorise ICICI Bank unconditionally and irrevocably to recover such TCS amount, if applicable (over and above the amount authorised for the transaction), form the funds available in my ICICI Bank account including Joint Account/Forex Prepaid Card balances. I declare that the total amount of foreign exchange purchased from or remitted through all the sources in India, during the financial year, including this application is within the overall limit of the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) (currently USD 250,000); the limit prescribed by the Reserve Bank of India. In case the remittances are made beyond the permissible limit under LRS, ICICI Bank is authorised to take appropriate action, which includes blocking the card for international transactions and immediate repatriation of the excess funds. Your card will be blocked for further transactions if you have opened an Aadhar- OTP based account. Do complete your KYC by visiting your nearest Branch.

We may, subject to the applicable guidelines issued by the Reserve Bank of India ("RBI") and/or National Payments Corporation of India ("NPCI") from time to time, enable You to avail 'UPI LITE' on the iMobile App. UPI LITE is an 'on-device wallet' for small value transactions enabled by NPCI. All banks may not enable/support UPI LITE. You shall be able to enable only one Bank Account that is linked on Your iMobile App for UPI LITE.

In order to enable UPI LITE, You shall be required to click/tap on the specific section on the iMobile App and add funds into the UPI LITE. By clicking/tapping on the specific section on the iMobile App. You provide your consent to enable the UPI LITE. The funds can be added only via Your Bank Account linked to UPI LITE on the iMobile App using Your UPI PIN. You shall be able to track the status of each transaction via UPI Lite on the iMobile App. Any amount added to the UPI LITE shall be non-interest bearing. In order to make payment via UPI LITE, You shall not be required to enter a UPI PIN. However, there would be limits that would be applicable with respect to the transactions via UPI LITE. The applicable transaction limits shall be as follows: 

• Every transaction using UPI LITE shall be limited to a maximum of INR %1$s. 
• The cumulative value of all transactions using UPI LITE in a day shall be limited to a maximum of INR %2$s
 • The maximum balance that can be held in the UPI LITE at one point in time shall be limited to INR %3$s. 

The above-stated transaction limits may be modified without any prior notice.

You shall have the right to disable the UPI LITE, at any time, from iMobile App. Once the UPI LITE is disabled, the balance funds shall be credited into Your linked Bank Account.

Except as provided above, all terms provided with respect to iMobile UPI shall be applicable to UPI LITE. Any disputes with respect to the transaction(s) authorized using UPI LITE shall be dealt with as per the process applicable for iMobile UPI.

We may be subject to the applicable guidelines issued by Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and/or National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) from time to time. To avail UPI LITE Auto Top-up on the iMobile app, all banks may not enable/support UPI LITE Auto Top-up. You shall be able to enable this feature only using the account using which you have created UPI LITE. You provide your consent to enable UPI LITE Auto Top-up. Your UPI LITE wallet will be automatically replenished using the account that you have linked.

Below are a few conditions that will be applicable during the Auto Top-up setup:
1. If the existing wallet balance is more than or equal to the Auto Top-up threshold, then to activate the Auto Top-up during the setup process, Rs. 1 will be deducted from your account and credited to the UPI LITE wallet.
2. If your linked account does not have sufficient balance and Auto Top-up fails, we will retry Auto Top-up after 1 hour. This process will be done three times, and if three subsequent Auto Top-up attempts fail, Auto Top-up will be paused till the end date.
3. If Auto Top-up attempts fail three times in a row, Auto Top-up will be paused till the end date.
4. At any given time, the UPI LITE wallet can have up to Rs. 2000. Auto Top-up can fail if this limit is breached because of already setup threshold and Auto Top-up amount.
5. Auto top-up on UPI LITE wallet can be executed maximum 5 times a day.
The above-mentioned limits can be modified without any prior notice.
You shall have the right to revoke, modify, or pause UPI LITE Auto Top-up. Except as provided above, all terms provided with respect to iMobile shall be applicable to the Lite Auto Top-up. Any dispute with respect to the transaction(s) authorized using UPI LITE Auto Top-up shall be dealt with as per the process applicable for iMobile UPI.
